name: Waltz
description: Typically in a 3/4 time signature and popular in the 18th century in central Europe, as it accompanied the ballroom dance of the same name.

children.name: Vals venezolano
children.description: Venezuelan dance music that employs heavy use of syncopation, complex rhythms, and regional instruments.

children.name: Valsa brasileira
children.description: Brazillian Waltz characterized by its slow rhythms and romantic sound.
